articles.title: 'We love you, Papa': Royal children mark Father's Day - BBC.com
articles.description: Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis post a Father's Day tribute to Prince William in their first social media post.
articles.content:
The photo was taken on the Norfolk coast last month
Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis have posted a Father's Day tribute to their father, Prince William, in their first social media… [+2315 chars]
